question: i) Can a Husband and Wife Read Salaat/Namaaz together ii) and can they make their own Jamaat, whereby the Husband is the Imaam and the Wife is the Mussallee?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The husband and wife may perform salah together in Jamaat. The husband would stand in front and the wife would stand behind him. (Ahsanul Fatawa Vol.3 Pg.299)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
